original_title: 緊縛忍法帖 ２ くノ一姉妹
overview: The name of a Japanese female ninja; in the past, during the Shogunate era, female ninjas pretended to be ordinary women, and they used temptations, charms, and other methods to achieve their missions through relationship with men. It is the fate of the female tolerant to complete the task with the body.
title: Ninja Sisters
